alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 9:33PM PDT until March 29 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches with higher snow amounts across the backcountry. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior County. * WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
